page.title: 06BLACKBIRD LEYS FARM
page.content: Blackbird Leys Farm consists of four hundred and sixty acres of which one hundred and ten are in grass and oil seed rape. The rest is in cereals, barley and wheat. The farmer also keeps about l00 beef cattle. The farmer employs two workers. He enjoys farming because he likes animals and working closely with the land. The work is very hard and the days long and tiring. He finds vandalism such as dumped cars and rubbish, left open gates, broken fences and arson very annoying. The farm will lose 200 acres when the new development of houses starts in l988. This loss of land will create many problems. The land is used for the disposal of two million gallons of sewage sludge a year. What will happen to it? One man will lose his job - one more for the dole queue.
